verses.verse: Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4046>plague,<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5375>"Take<s%> a <S%H7218>census<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> is able to <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with them in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"[Take a census of the people] from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>" Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H3318>came<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> [were: ]

<S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> Israel's first-born, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben:<s%> [of] <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2599>Hanochites;<s%> of <S%H6396>Pallu,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6384>Palluites;<s%>
of <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2697>Hezronites;<s%> of <S%H3756>Carmi,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3757>Carmites.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were 43730.
And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6396>Pallu:<s%> <S%H446>Eliab.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab:<s%> <S%H5241>Nemuel<s%> and <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram.<s%> <S%H1931>These<s%> are the <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram<s%> <S%H7148>who<s%> were <S%H7148>called<s%> by the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5327>contended<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H5712>company<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> when they <S%H5327>contended<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> them up along with <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> when that <S%H5712>company<s%> <S%H4194>died,<s%> when the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H250><s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> so that they <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H5251>warning.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> however, did not <S%H4191>die.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H5241>Nemuel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5242>Nemuelites;<s%> of <S%H3226>Jamin,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3228>Jaminites;<s%> of <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3200>Jachinites;<s%>
of <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zerahites;<s%> of <S%H7586>Shaul,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7587>Shaulites.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H8099>Simeonites,<s%> 22200.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H6827>Zephon,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6831>Zephonites;<s%> of <S%H2291>Haggi,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2291>Haggites;<s%> of <S%H7764>Shuni,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7765>Shunites;<s%>
of <S%H244>Ozni,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H9006>Oznites;<s%> of <S%H6179>Eri,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6180>Erites;<s%>
of <S%H720>Arod,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H722>Arodites;<s%> of <S%H692>Areli,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H692>Arelites.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, 40500.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> [were] <S%H6147>Er<s%> and <S%H209>Onan,<s%> but <S%H6147>Er<s%> and <S%H209>Onan<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> were: of <S%H7956>Shelah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8024>Shelanites;<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6558>Perezites;<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zerahites.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> were: of <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2697>Hezronites;<s%> of <S%H2538>Hamul,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2539>Hamulites.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, 76500.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> [of] <S%H8439>Tola,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8440>Tolaites;<s%> of <S%H6312>Puvah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6324>Punites;<s%>
of <S%H3437>Jashub,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3432>Jashubites;<s%> of <S%H9616>Shimron,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8117>Shimronites.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, 64300.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H5624>Sered,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5625>Seredites;<s%> of <S%H356>Elon,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H440>Elonites;<s%> of <S%H3177>Jahleel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3178>Jahleelites.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H2075>Zebulunites<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, 60500.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4354>Machirites;<s%> and <S%H4353>Machir<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead:<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1569>Gileadites.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead:<s%> [of] <S%H372>Iezer,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H373>Iezerites;<s%> of <S%H2507>Helek,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2516>Helekites;<s%>
and [of] <S%H844>Asriel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H845>Asrielites;<s%> and [of] <S%H7928>Shechem,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7930>Shechemites;<s%>
and [of] <S%H8061>Shemida,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8062>Shemidaites;<s%> and [of] <S%H2660>Hepher,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2662>Hepherites.<s%>

Now <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> but <S%H518>only<s%> <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> were <S%H4244>Mahlah,<s%> <S%H5270>Noah,<s%> <S%H2295>Hoglah,<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah<s%> and <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were 52700.

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H7803>Shuthelah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8364>Shuthelahites;<s%> of <S%H1071>Becher,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1076>Becherites;<s%> of <S%H8465>Tahan,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8470>Tahanites.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7803>Shuthelah:<s%> of <S%H6197>Eran,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6198>Eranites.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, 32500. <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1108>Belaites;<s%> of <S%H788>Ashbel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H789>Ashbelites;<s%> of <S%H297>Ahiram,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H298>Ahiramites;<s%>
of <S%H8197>Shephupham,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7781>Shuphamites;<s%> of <S%H2349>Hupham,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2350>Huphamites.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> were <S%H714>Ard<s%> and <S%H5283>Naaman:<s%> [of Ard,] the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H716>Ardites;<s%> of <S%H5283>Naaman,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5280>Naamites.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families;<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were 45600.

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H7748>Shuham,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7749>Shuhamites.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7749>Shuhamites,<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, were 64400.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H3232>Imnah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3232>Imnites;<s%> of <S%H3440>Ishvi,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3441>Ishvites;<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1284>Beriites.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah:<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2277>Heberites;<s%> of <S%H4439>Malchiel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4440>Malchielites.<s%>
And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> [was] <S%H8294>Serah.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> according to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, 53400.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H3183>Jahzeel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3184>Jahzeelites;<s%> of <S%H1476>Guni,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1477>Gunites;<s%>
of <S%H3337>Jezer,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3340>Jezerites;<s%> of <S%H8006>Shillem,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8016>Shillemites.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families;<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were 45400.
<S%H428>These<s%> are those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 601730.
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"Among <S%H428>these<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names.<s%>

"To the <S%H7227>larger<s%> [group] you shall <S%H7235>increase<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and to the <S%H4592>smaller<s%> [group] you shall <S%H4591>diminish<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them.

"But the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> by <S%H1486>lot.<s%> They shall <S%H5157>receive<s%> their <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> according to the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of their fathers.

<S%H5921>"According<s%> <S%H6310><s%> to the selection by <S%H1486>lot,<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H7227>larger<s%> and the <S%H4592>smaller<s%> [groups.]"

And <S%H428>these<s%> are those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites;<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites;<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4848>Merarites.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi:<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3846>Libnites,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2276>Hebronites,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4250>Mahlites,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4188>Mushites,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7145>Korahites.<s%> And <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram.<s%>

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H3115>Jochebed,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H3878>Levi<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to Amram: <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and their <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H4813>Miriam.<s%>
And to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>
But <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> when they <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were 23000, <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> for they were not <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> to them <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> by <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

But among <S%H428>these<s%> there was not a <S%H376>man<s%> of those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> by <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
